name: CAVE (Wellzitu)
description:
CAVE

Control the mole and try to find a new home for him. To avoid obstacles and dangerous situations, you can dig and pass through.

CONTROLS:
ARROWS -> MOVEMENT
Z - > ACTIVE DIG
X - > CONFIRM POSITION

Game made for RPG Biz's 2D One Map Challenge.

Art, Programming and Audio made by Welliton Souza.
